column4: how do i stop my cpu freq from throttling and have it run at full speed all the time?
whoah you talking about overclocking cause that different channel
no not overclock, i have a 1.86ghz proc that is running at 1ghz but throttles to 1.86ghz under pressure. I want it to always run at 1.86ghz like it was intended to; not overclocking.
sorry i don't know what could cause that but it sounds like it isn't somehting that should be messed with if it is running like that seems fine
